code: import{apiCall}from'../../services/api';import{GET_PRODUCTS}from'../types';import empty from'is-empty';export var state_get_products=function state_get_products(payload){return{type:GET_PRODUCTS,payload:payload};};export var db_get_products=function db_get_products(){return function(dispatch){return apiCall('get',"/api/products/active").then(function(res){dispatch(state_get_products(res));return{complete:true};}).catch(function(err){return{complete:false,message:err.error};});};};
